title: Adamant spear

properties.name: description
properties.value: The adamant spear is a two-handed members'-only melee weapon. It can be bought from the Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the Smithing skill, players can create adamant spears with level 75 Smithing This requires 1 adamantite bar and 1 yew log. However, players must have begun Barbarian Smithing training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the adamant spear can be poisoned. Smithing the adamant spear is a requirement for the Kandarin Hard Diary.

The adamant spear is a two-handed members'-only melee weapon. It can be bought from the Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the Smithing skill, players can create adamant spears with level 75 Smithing This requires 1 adamantite bar and 1 yew log. However, players must have begun Barbarian Smithing training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the adamant spear can be poisoned. Smithing the adamant spear is a requirement for the Kandarin Hard Diary.

UnpoisonedPoisonPoison+
Poison++Karambwan poison

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The spear's attack speed has been decreased from 6 (every 3.6 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

26 February 2015
(update)

The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adam spear(p++)" to "Adamant spear(p++)".

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adamant spear(+)" to "Adamant spear(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adamant spear(s)" to "Adam spear(p++)".

The '''adamant spear''' is a two-handed [[members]]'-only [[melee weapon]]. It can be bought from the [[Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop]] or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the [[Smithing]] skill, players can create adamant spears with level 75 [[Smithing]] This requires 1 [[adamantite bar]] and 1 [[Yew logs|yew log]]. However, players must have begun [[Barbarian Smithing]] training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the adamant spear can be [[poison]]ed. Smithing the adamant spear is a requirement for the [[Kandarin Hard Diary]].
